mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}, MEMBER_TEL = #{memberTel}, MEMBER_ADDRESS = #{memberAddress} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO, FILE_PATH, FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME, FILE_RENAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(FILE_UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FILE_UPLOAD_DATE FROM UPLOAD_FILE U JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = U.MEMBER_NO WHERE U.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC
